name: Chaos Grenade
effects: Physical damage (1.8x, ATK) to all enemies
Inflict one random status effect (Petrify 100% and Poison, Blind, Sleep, Silence, Paralyze, Confusion and Disease 30%) to all enemies
Reduce ATK, DEF, MAG and SPR by 30% for 3 turns to all enemies

name: Chaos Grenade
混沌手榴彈
카오스 그레네이드
Grenade Chaos
Chaosgranate
Granada caótica
desc_short: Damage, inflict random status ailment, and reduce ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR for all enemies
攻擊全體敵人+隨機施加異常狀態+降低攻擊防禦魔力精神
적 전체에 피해+무작위 상태이상 부여+공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력 감소
Dégâts, altération d'état au hasard et réduit l'ATT, la DEF, la MAGIE et la PSY de tous les ennemis
Schaden und zuf. Zustand, ANG, ABW, MAG und PSY runter, alle Ziele
Daño, estado alterado al azar y reduce ATQ/DEF/MAG/ESP a enemigos
desc_long: Damage all enemies, randomly poison, blind, put to sleep, silence, paralyze, confuse, disease, and petrify, and reduce their ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR.
攻擊全體敵人並隨機施加異常狀態，同時降低攻擊防禦魔力精神的數值。
적 전체에 피해를 주고 무작위 상태이상을 부여하며 공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력을 감소시킵니다.
Dégâts, altération d'état au hasard et réduit l'ATT, la DEF, la MAGIE et la PSY de tous les ennemis
Fügt allen Gegnern Schaden zu und verursacht zufällige Zustände und reduziert ANG, ABW, MAG und PSY.
Daño, estado alterado al azar y reduce ATQ/DEF/MAG/ESP a enemigos
